fileheader.author: Aeromatic based mod Gerard Robin
fileheader.documentation: Manufacturer: Lockheed Aircraft Corporation Length:107' 5" Length of Nose Probe:4' 11" Wing Span:55' 7" Wing Area:1,795 ft. sq. Wing Aspect Ratio:1.939 Wing Root Chord:60.533 Wing Dihedral Angle:0 degrees Wing Chord:0.00 Wing Sweep:52.629 degrees Inboard Elevon Area:39.00 ft. sq. Outboard Elevon Area:52.50 ft. sq. Total Vertical Rudder Area:150.76 ft. sq. Moveable Rudder Area:70.24 ft. sq. Rudder Root Chord:14.803 ft. Rudder Tip Chord:7.833 ft. Height:18' 6" Empty Weight:59,000 lbs. Maximum Weight:170,000 lbs. Fuselage Diameter:5.33 ft. Service Ceiling:85,000'+ Maximum Speed:Mach 3.3+ (Limit CIT of 427 degrees C) Cruising Speed:Mach 3.2 Engines:2 Pratt Whittney J-58 (JT11D-20A) with 34,000 lbs. of thrust. Range:3,200 nautical miles without refueling

switch.name: Brake Chute Deploy
switch.test: fcs/chute-pos-norm == 1 velocities/vc-kts lt 200 velocities/vc-kts gt 50 position/h-agl-ft lt 20 fcs/throttle-pos-norm lt 0.1

axis.name: DRAG
axis.documentation: tricky solution=> 4.5 mach column only to limit the speed , the model, must not be able to go over
